txt.en: Thurferth, a White Hand Emissary and a Dunlending named Cadwalader are standing in front of the throne.\n\nThose who organized the fall of Woodhurst now boldly claim ownership of the city.

'You and I will take the right side. Gifemund and Nothmar should be able to handle the left. Keep your eye on them and help if they need it, but you should stick with me.\n\n'We will make quick work of the defilers of our great hall.'
Instance: Woodhurst Has Fallen
Speak with Herubrand
Speak with Herubrand
<rgb=#FF0000>Scurfa must survive</rgb>
Defeat Thurferth and the enemy at the throne
Herubrand is near the throne in the mead hall.\n\nHerubrand would like to thank you for your part in aiding their victory.
Follow the others into the mead hall
Speak with Herubrand
<rgb=#FF0000>Herubrand has been defeated</rgb>
You defeated the enemy around the fountain, and can hear Herubrand and Nothmar approaching...
Make your way to the throne
<rgb=#FF0000>Gifemund has been defeated</rgb>
Speak with Herubrand
<rgb=#FF0000>Manna must survive</rgb>
'We have a fight ahead of us. Herubrand and Nothmar said they would meet us at the fountain. We should capture and hold the fountain area while they make their way to us.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Nothmar has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Scurfa must survive</rgb>
'This is only the beginning. We need to make our way to the mead hall door. Nothmar's men will stay with Manna and Scurfa, and will hold the fountain area behind us.'
Speak with Gifemund ahead of you.\n\nThe time has come to re-capture the fountain area, but you will need Gifemund's aid.
Defeat the enemy who hold the fountain area in Woodhurst.
Herubrand has arrived at the fountain.\n\nHerubrand wishes to speak with you about the plan to retake the mead hall.
The White Hand have conquered Woodhurst and are now openly marching in the streets. You must aid Herubrand, Gifemund, and Nothmar in reclaiming the city.
Capture the fountain area
'Arnwi's fate was sealed when he killed Calin, and turned on all of us with the White Hand.\n\n'They are likely prepared for us inside. We need to be careful. The time to end this is now.'
The enemy has heavily guarded the pathway up to the mead hall, and appear to be guarding the front door.
Speak with Herubrand
Herubrand waits to speak with you before approaching those waiting for you at the throne of the mead hall.
Defeat the enemy outside the mead hall
'If any enemy still remain in the city they will be routed out. With their leaders defeated there will no longer be organized resistance. The city is finally ours again.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Manna has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Scurfa has been defeated</rgb>
Herubrand is standing outside the mead hall door.\n\nHerubrand wishes to speak with you after defeating Arnwi.
Enter the mead hall with the others.\n\nThe battle for Woodhurst has progressed into the mead hall.
Enter the Woodhurst mead hall
'Thurferth, that vile traitor! He helped them take the city...\n\n'Weapons ready! For glory!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Herubrand must survive</rgb>
Speak with Gifemund
Herubrand signals to Nothmar and Gifemund to attack
<rgb=#FF0000>Gifemund must survive</rgb>
Herubrand is within the door of the mead hall.\n\nHerubrand wishes to give directions on how the group will approach the coming battle.
<rgb=#FF0000>Nothmar must survive</rgb>
Defeat the enemy throughout the mead hall and make your way to the throne.
<rgb=#FF0000>Scurfa has been defeated</rgb>
TBD

'We are victorious! [placeholder], I cannot thank you enough for your aid in reclaiming Woodhurst from the cruel grip of the White Hand. We could not have claimed victory today without you.\n\n'Gifemund and I have much to discuss about the future of Woodhurst. There is time for that. Today, we celebrate our victory.'
